definitions.title: n.pr.loc.
definitions.body: (etym. dub.) in (the Shephelah of) Judah, Mic 1:15 (where named with [[אַכְזִיבּ]] etc.), Jos 15:44 (id.), cf. 2Ch 11:8, 2Ch 14:8, 2Ch 14:9, 2Ch 20:37; so appar. (as n.pr.m. in geneal. scheme) 1Ch 2:42, 1Ch 4:21.—Cf. 2Ma 12:35 (Marisa), 1Ma 5:66 (rd. Marisa for Samaria, cf. Var. Apocr.).—Joseph:Ant. xii. 8, 6 (Marissa). LXX A Jos 15:44 Marhsa\ LXXL barsha; LXX 1Ch 2:42 Mar(e)isa LXXL Marhsa, etc. Prob. = mod. Merāsh 1 m. S. of Beit Jibrin (Eleutheropolis), cf. Rob:BR ii. 31 Be:1Ch 2:42 GASm:Geogr. 233 (who identify. with ([[גַּת]]) [[מוֹרֶשֶׁת]] Mic 1:14 q. v. sub [[ירשׁ]] p. 440 supr., but v. Lag:Ono.n. 139, 141, 279, 282) Buhl:Geogr. 192.
